dublin_core.dcvalue: We carried out a feasibility study of an interactive television IATV system to enhance the provision of psychiatric intensive care services to a remote adult acute psychiatric ward in the same National Health Service mental health trust The system used videoconferencing equipment connected by ISDN at 128 kbit s The system was used for patient referral assessment and monitoring by staff at the remote site 8 km away
Interactive television for an urban adult mental health service: the Guy's Psychiatric Intensive Care Unit Telepsychiatry Project.
